events.summary: A Happy Hunting New Year - Black Diablos Comeback
events.description: Black Diablos will be appearing in desert habitats for hunters HR 11 and above.

events.summary: A Happy Hunting New Year - Increased Monster Activity
events.description: Monsters in all habitats will reappear in shorter intervals and in higher numbers than usual.

events.summary: A Happy Hunting New Year - Pink Rathian Comeback
events.description: Pink Rathian will be appearing in forest habitats for hunters HR 11 and above.

events.summary: A Happy Hunting New Year - Zinogre Appearance Boost
events.description: The appearance rate of Zinogre will be boosted at Hunt-a-thon Points for all hunters HR 11 and above.
Event featuring the return of Pink Rathian and Black Diablos, with event-exclusive equipment and quests rewarding lots of Zenny.
During this event, Zinogre's appearance rates in Hunt-a-thons will be boosted, and hunters can complete exclusive Event Quests to receive a new Hunter Medal.
Launch of Hunt-a-thons, a new hunting experience where some gathering points turn into Hunt-a-thon Points, allowing hunters to hunt five large monsters in succession.

events.summary: Fulminations in the Frost Major Update
events.description: Introduction of two new weapon types (Dual Blades and Lances), four new large monsters (Radobaan, Banbaro, Barioth, and Zinogre), a new sleep element for weapons, rebalancing of existing weapon types and monsters, and a snowy field change for winter habitats.
Limited-time in-game event to celebrate Monster Hunter Now's nomination for Best Mobile Game during The Game Awards.
All hunters will receive double the materials for slaying 1-2★ monsters.
New hunters will receive free 5 Potions and 5000 Zenny, claimable from the in-game shop.
Time-limited Event Quests rewarding materials needed for upgrading equipment, such as Carpenterbugs and Monster Bones, as well as gatherable materials like Dragonite Ore, and Zenny.
